summary: A choice of various discreet re-textures for the Khajiit vampire eyes.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]*May not work with Dawnguard (feel free to test it)
[/size][color=#f4f4f4]*Please make sure to read the description fully, as the installation guide is at the bottom.[/color]

[size=4]           [/size][size=5]Discreet Khajiit vampire eyes[/size]

[size=3]This will replace the eyes that any vampire Khajiit may have.[/size]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/xDqnIYV.png[/img]﻿

[size=4]There are currently 5 variants to choose from.   [/size]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/rgNwhfu.png[/img]﻿


[u][size=5]Installation [/size][/u]

[list]
[*][size=3]Download the file and choose *one* texture[/size]
[*][size=3]Create a folder in your Skyrim data folder called "Textures"[/size]
[*][size=3]Create a folder in your textures folder called "actors"[/size]
[*][size=3]Create a folder inside of the actors folder called "characters"[/size]
[*][size=3]Create a folder inside of your characters folder called "eyes"[/size]
[*][size=3]Paste the texture into your eyes folder. Make sure it is called "eyekhajiitvampire".[/size]
[/list][size=3]
To remove the re-texture, simply delete the file.[/size]
author: Heirfing
